Package org.cyclops.cyclopscore.block

Interface IBlockGui

All Known Implementing Classes:
BlockGui, BlockWithEntityGui
public interface IBlockGui
Block gui component. Pass IBlockGui.IBlockContainerProvider.get(BlockState, Level, BlockPos) ass a lambda to specify the gui. Optionally implement getOpenStat() to specify a stat on gui opening.
